item.title: Migrate from Docker to Containerd in Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes is deprecating Docker as a container runtime after v1.20. Don’t Panic ğŸ˜± Docker containers are still supported, but the dockershim/Docker, the layer between Kubernetes and containerd is deprecated and will be removed from version 1.22+.
